Data_loader¶

data_loader¶

label_loader¶

e2e.data_loader.label_loader.load_label(label_path, encoding='utf-8')[source]¶

Provides char2id, id2char

Parameters:
  • label_path (str) – csv file with character labels
  • encoding (str) – encoding method
Returns: char2id, id2char
  • char2id (dict): char2id[ch] = id
  • id2char (dict): id2char[id] = ch
e2e.data_loader.label_loader.load_targets(label_paths)[source]¶

Provides dictionary of filename and labels

Parameters:label_paths (list) – set of label paths
Returns: target_dict
  • target_dict (dict): dictionary of filename and labels
